response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is not just any commodity; it's a treasure that could potentially transform your life or business in ways you might not have imagined. Given its significance and the fact that it is worth $1,000,000 to you, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to reflect its true worth while providing you with a substantial saving. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial planning. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
